CustomField.description: Calculates the balance based upon the total of the payment plan and the total payments made
CustomField.formula: IF( BEGINS(Case__r.RecordType.Name, "BOFE") || BEGINS(Case__r.RecordType.Name, "RCI") , Payment_Plan_Total_Amount_Due__c - Payment_Plan_Down__c - Total_Payment_Amount__c, Payment_Plan_Total_Amount_Due__c - Payment_Plan_Down__c - Total_Payment_Amount__c + Payment_Plan_Down__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Remaining balance on the payment plan.
CustomField.label: Payment Plan Balance
